content: 3d beanie 3d beanie 2 yarn notes sport weight yarn in the following to avoid jogs uneven stripes at the beginning of quantities rounds i use this jogless join method main colour green 110m /120 yards because chart 2 is so wide it has been split into 3 contrast colour 1 natural 95m/104 yards parts when you get to these charts start with round 1 contrast colour 2 bronze 5m/6 yards of depose followed by round 1 of deny and then round 1 of delay continue as established until you have the sample hat was knitted in rauma completed round 15 finullgarn 175m/50g if you want to omit the words work chart 4 instead of chart 2 remember to increase 4 sts on round 17 needles marked with ★ on the charts 3 mm / us 2 5 circular needle 50 cm 3 mm / us 2 5 double-pointed needles hat with mc cast on 140 sts on circular needle place gauge marker and join in a round work chart 1 15 sts x 16 row = 5 cm/2 over leaf motif then work chart 2 on round 17 marked with ★ on on chart 3 blocked the charts increase 4 sts evenly spaced = 144 sts these incs are not shown on the chart finished measurements then work chart 3 = 12 sts rem after round 47 height 23 cm/9 draw up rem sts circumference 51cm/20 weave in ends block the hat will fit a 56cm/22 head if desired add a tassel or pompon abbreviations cc1 contrast colour 1 cc2 contrast colour 2 increase increase k knit k2tog knit 2 stitches together mc main colour p purl rem remain round round sk2p slip 1 stitch knitwise knit 2 stitches together pass the slipped stitch over sl slip ssk slip slip knit st s stitch es © lanja khon-engheim 2024 3d beanie 3 cc1 \ 47 mc t 45 cc2 43 41 ssk \ / \ 39 k2tog / 37 sk2p t 35 - p / \ 33 ✭ increase 4 sts evenly spaced on this round 31 these incs are not shown on the charts 29 / \ 27 25 23 / \ 21 19 17 ★ 17 15 15 13 13 11 11 9 9 7 7 5 5 3 3 1 1 chart 4 chart 3 11 - - - - 9 - - - - 7 - - - - 5 - - - - 3 - - - - 1 chart 1 © lanja khon-engheim 2024 3d beanie 4 17 ★ 15 13 11 9 7 5 3 1 17 ★ 15 13 11 9 7 5 3 1 17 ★ 15 13 11 9 7 5 3 1 chart 2 © lanja khon-engheim 2024
